column6: Halves reload times. While active, the player absorbs enemy bullets and regains ammo.
Projectile impacts can trigger a short range blank. Increases curse by 1.5.
Increases damage and fire rate with every bullet that hits an enemy.
Makes all guns act as if they have all their synergies.
Decreases health of all enemies encountered by 25%.
Reveals all floor-maps for the rest of the run.
Slows down time immensely while standing still. Moving speeds up time back to normal.
Increases the quality of chests found in chest rooms to an equal chance of red or black.
Quadruples maximum ammo.
Upon death, the player is revived in the starting room of the first floor, retaining all items and guns.
Allows any chest or lock to be opened without using a key. Increases curse by 1 while held.
Follows the player, firing bullets at enemies and occasionally using short-ranged blanks.
Follows the player, firing bullets at enemies.
Follows the player and attacks enemies with a green laser.
Grants a heart container, fully heals the player, increases damage by 30%, increases dodge roll speed by 15%, increases movement speed by 10%, and adds a chance to negate damage.
Deals a large amount of damage to all enemies in a room. Increases curse by 1 while held.
Grants 2 heart containers. Upon entering a room, there is a chance that an enemy will be charmed for the duration of the room. Increases fire rate by 15%. Increase curse by 2 while held.
Adds a chance to get armor upon completing a room.
Adds a chance to get hearts upon completing a room.
Briefly stops enemies and enemy bullets. Can be used to steal from shops.

If the player enters a room while under the box, enemies will not target the player. Firing a weapon will remove the box. Has no effect if used while enemies are already targeting the player. Can be used to steal items from shops.
Teleports a chest to the next floor, with a chance to upgrade its quality.
The player is invulnerable while reloading an empty magazine.
While active, the player is invincible and instantly kills enemies they come in contact with.
Creates a beam of electricity between fired bullets.
Whenever the player fires, occasionally fires a special high-damage bullet.
Adds a chance for the player's bullets to block enemy projectiles, growing in damage and size as they do so.
Adds a chance to fire bullets that explode upon hitting an enemy or object.
The first shot of a weapon's magazine will deal 80% more damage.
The final shot of each magazine deals double damage.
Adds a chance to fire bullets that freeze enemies.
Doubles bullet size and knockback, increases damage by 30%, and decreases maximum ammo by 10%.
Missed shots orbit the player.
Bullets increase in size and damage as they travel.
Adds random bullet effects to the player's bullets.
Grants a heart container, increases damage by 15%, increases movement speed, and increases coolness by 1.
Increases damage by 35% but decreases accuracy.
Using an active item fires the currently held weapon in all directions.
Increases damage by 10%, adds a 10% chance to negate damage, and increases movement speed.
Single use. Increases certain stats upon use, depending on how many times it has been used. Each time a spice cube is used, more spice cubes will spawn in place of items or pickups.
Decreases enemy bullet speed by 20%.
Grants two pieces of armor upon pickup and one piece of armor every floor.
Heals the player for one heart upon use. Gains 2 charges each floor.
Summons Gatling Gull as a temporary ally.
Single use. Combines 2 guns by granting one gun the projectiles that the other gun fires.
Rolling through bullets collects them in the sack. Using the sack empties the sack and fires a piece of explosive cheese for every bullet collected. Grants 3 extra active item slots.
Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Shoots at enemies.
Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Chance to heal upon taking damage.
Heals the player after dealing 1200 damage to enemies. Increases Curse by 1.
Every chest is guaranteed to be a Mimic.
Boosts stats when alone. Only available in co-op, where The Cultist starts with this item.
Blanks have a chance to poison, freeze, and ignite enemies. Grants an extra blank per floor.
Increases Coolness by 2 for each point of Curse the player has. Increases curse by 2 while held. Removes the usual curse penalty towards getting a room clearing reward.

Adds a heart container. Upon death, the player respawns at the start of the current floor with one heart container. All enemies previously killed will respawn, and if the player reaches the location where they died, they will return to normal.
Orbits the player, firing rockets at enemies.

Summons a police officer that follows the player, firing bullets at enemies. Can be talked to. Can die after taking too much damage. Talking to him after he dies increases the player's damage by 20% and curse by 2.
Upon death, instantly revives the player with full health.
Temporarily transforms into Windgunner under special circumstances.
Activates a blank each time an active item is used.
Grants 250  and 3 .
Single use. Fully heals the player, grants a heart container, and increases coolness by 2.
Calls down a bombardment on a large rectangular area.
Calls down a missile at the crosshair, causing a large explosion that leaves behind a large pool of poison creep. Increases curse by 1 while held.
Adds a chance to get keys upon completing a room.

Summons a random familiar with a clown mask who either stuns enemies, protects the player with mini blanks, or attacks enemies with a shotgun. An additional familiar is spawned for each additional Payday item the player has.
While active, bullets will curve around the player.
Places a stationary turret that shoots at enemies. The turret will be destroyed if it takes enough damage.
While active, the player is invincible.
Throws a boomerang that travels around the room and attempts to stun all enemies.
Can be used immediately after dodging a bullet to activate a blank effect.
Increases the player's bullet speed by 50%, increases damage by 10%, and increases rate of fire by 10%.
Bullets have a chance to devolve enemies into simpler enemies.
Guns fire a spread of tripled bullets which deal less damage.
Adds a chance to fire bullets that poison enemies.
Adds a chance to fire bullets that ignite enemies.
Adds a chance to fire bullets that charm enemies.
Grants all of the player's bullets a small chance to transmogrify enemies into chickens.
Bullets have a chance to home in on enemies.
Firing a weapon has a chance to fire an additional projectile.
Increases damage at close range and decreases as bullets travel.
Increases damage based on the amount of money the player has.
Upon firing, adds a chance to fire projectiles from the player's other guns.
Doubles fired bullets and makes them move in a helix pattern, but slightly decreases damage.
Upon firing, adds a chance to fire a bee, which homes in on and damages enemies.
Adds a chance to fire a fast, homing bullet that flies around the room damaging enemies.
Increases movement speed.
Once per floor, if the Resourceful Rat takes an item or gun, he will give another item or gun of equal quality in return. Unused trades carry over to subsequent floors.
Increases damage based on the other guns the player has.
Increases the chance of finding chests.
While active, the player is invincible and has flight. Allows user to steal items from shops.
Causes bullets to slightly curve towards enemies.
Decreases enemy bullet speed by 15%.
Grants a piece of armor upon pickup and another piece of armor every floor.
Automatically activates one of the player's blanks when they are about to take damage.
Dodge rolling leaves a trail of poison creep. Makes the player immune to poison.
Reduces the cooldown timer of active items. Increases coolness by 3.
Charms enemies around the player upon use. Can be used to steal from shops.
Grants a damage bonus for each enemy killed. The bonus is reset if the player takes damage or changes guns.
Adds a chance to heal the player for an extra half a heart whenever they receive healing.
Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Grants one extra heart container.
Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Grants an extra blank per floor.
Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Improves dodging.
Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Upon taking damage, briefly slows time.
Increases the magazine size of all weapons by 50%.
With each shot fired, a second bullet will be fired in the opposite direction that the player is aiming.
Grants flight.
Shoots miniature bullets upon rolling and grants flight.
Upon use, spawns several enemies and has a chance to spawn a gun or item. Increases curse by 1 while held.
Grants two pieces of armor upon pickup. Grants a piece of armor every 4 times damage is taken.
Increases blank damage. Grants an extra blank per floor.
Blanks have a chance to poison enemies. Grants an extra blank per floor.
Blanks have a chance to ignite enemies. Grants an extra blank per floor.
Blanks have a chance to freeze enemies. Grants an extra blank per floor.
Replaces the dodge roll with a teleport. Increases reload speed.
Decreases bullet spread by 66%.
Reloading a weapon fires it once for free.
Grants immunity to fire, poison, and electricity.
Reveals secret rooms.
Chases and bites enemies.
Follows the player, firing bullets at enemies.
Summons a chicken that follows the player and blocks bullets. After taking a certain amount of damage, it summons an army of chickens to attack enemies.
Follows the player, firing lasers at enemies and blocking enemy bullets.
If no other familiars are present, follows the player and attacks enemies. If familiars are present, transforms into another one of the player's familiars.

Deal more damage to Bosses.
Increases reload speed and accuracy.
Deals 45 damage to enemies upon taking damage.
Activates a blank. Increases curse by 2 while held.
Teleports the player to a random room.
Single use. Heals the player for 4 hearts.
Single use. Heals the player for two hearts. Automatically used if the player runs out of health.
Stuns enemies. Can be used to steal items from shops.
Places 5 small mines that explode when an enemy comes into contact with them.
Sets a large rectangular area on fire.
Dodge rolling leaves behind a bomb.
Detonates all explosives and explosive enemies in the room.
Grants an extra active item slot and increases maximum ammo by 20%.
Shots are more powerful when coming out of a dodge roll.
Enemies drop more money, but the player drops money upon taking damage. Selling other items to the Sell Creep grants twice as much money.
Shows enemy health and damage done. Increases damage and accuracy. Increases curse by 1.
Decreases bullet spread by 50% and adds a red laser sight to the player's weapons.
Spawns a black hole that attracts enemies and bullets.
Places a decoy that enemies will target. The decoy will explode after taking enough damage. Can be used to steal from shops.
Causes enemy corpses to explode on use.
Temporarily become invisible to enemies. Can be used to steal from the Shop.
Spawns bees that home in on and damage enemies.
Pulls up a shield to protect players from bullets. Players are immobile while using the shield.
Increases damage by 25%.
Upon killing an enemy, bullets have a chance to unleash a flurry of slashes along the path of the original bullet, damaging enemies. Increases curse by 1.
Grants bullets the ability to bounce off objects.
Bullets pass through enemies and obstacles.
Hitting an enemy refires the projectile at a nearby enemy.
Dodge rolling reloads one bullet.
Fired bullets curve towards the player's crosshair. Increases damage by 10%.
Adds a chance to refund ammo when a shot misses.
Whenever a bullet hits an enemy or wall, it splits into several smaller, lower-damage bullets.
Increases damage to jammed enemies by 225% and Increases damage to bosses by 25%.
Increases damage depending on how much curse the player has. Increases curse by 1 while held.
Increases movement speed and grants a piece of armor.
Increases movement speed.
Increases movement speed.
Decreases shop prices by 15%.
Heals the player half a heart upon purchasing an item.
Increases the player's coolness by 3, which decreases the cooldown of active items and increases luck.
Increases weapon accuracy and reload speed.
New floors have a chance to be mapped out.
Grants immunity to fire.
Grants two heart containers. Disappears upon spending money.
Breaking chests heals the player.
Greatly shortens the time at the end of a dodge roll where the player is vulnerable.
Grants a piece of armor upon pickup and another piece of armor every floor.
Grants a piece of armor upon pickup and another piece of armor every floor.
Provides immunity to contact damage, and increases damage dealt by dodge rolling into enemies. Grants armor upon pickup.
Dodge rolling fires a spread of five bullets backwards. Slightly increases movement speed.
Grants temporary invulnerability and flight when the player steps over a pit.
Increases the chance to find  shells upon completing rooms.
Halves reload time.
Rolling through bullets reflects them at enemies.
Place to create a zone of infinite ammo.

When reloading, pressing reload again when the indicator passes a certain mark on the reload bar will instantly reload the weapon, decreasing the reload time and increasing the damage and accuracy of the next magazine.
Taking damage spawns bees that seek out and damage enemies.
Deals damage to nearby enemies.
3 uses. Kills all enemies in a random room on the floor. Increases coolness by 2 and grants a 20% discount at shops while held.
Slows down time and increases dodge power during explosions. Increases coolness by 2.
Can be toggled. While active, the player has increased movement speed and flight, but cannot dodge roll. Passing over puddles of oil will set them on fire.
Taking damage spawns a pool of poison creep. Grants immunity to poison creep and a heart container.
Flipping a table causes it to launch forward and explode.
Flipping a table activates a free blank.
Flipping a table briefly stuns nearby enemies.
Removes all liquids near the player and allows the player to understand Professor Goopton
Improves the contents of broken chests.
Summons Ser Junkan, who follows the player, attacks enemies, and becomes stronger for each Junk picked up.
Recovers 1 ammo after landing three sequential hits.
Clearing a room spawns a turtle companion. Turtles block enemy bullets and die after taking enough damage.
Grants a heart container.
Grants a heart container.
Grants a heart container.
Grants a heart container.
Grants a heart container.
Grants a heart container. Taking damage releases bouncing ice bullets. Increases coolness by 1.
Single use. Heals the player for one heart. Grants double damage until the player takes damage.
Holds hearts or ammo for use later.
Throws a bomb that explodes after a short delay.
Throws a bomb that freezes enemies.
Places a mine that explodes when an enemy comes near it.
Places explosives on the ground which then can be detonated by using the item again.
Using the egg while missing health fully heals the player. Dropping the egg and shooting it spawns a gun, item, or yolk creature. Dropping the egg into fire spawns a serpent.
Throws a Molotov that sets an area on fire.
Single use. Spawns ammo box.
Adds a chance to regain ammo upon killing an enemy.
Allows the player to hold an extra active item.
If used on a locked chest, forces the player to fight two waves of enemies and unlocks the chest if they survive. If used on a locked door, opens it for free.
Decreases bullet spread by 60%.
Increases maximum ammo by 20%.
Slows down time while active.
Places a decoy that enemies will target. The decoy will be destroyed after taking enough damage. Can be used to steal from shops.
Creates a copy of the player that mimics their movements in reverse and fires alongside them.
Has a 50% chance to unlock a lock or locked chest. If it fails, the lock will no longer function.
While active, the player reflects enemy bullets.
While active, doubles the player's bullets.
Creates a pool of poison creep.
While active, increases damage, fire rate, knockback, and reload speed.

Creates a ring of knives around the player that damage enemies and block enemy bullets. Knives vanish after taking enough damage. If used again while the shield is active, the knives are launched forward. Increases curse by 1 while held.

Allows players to hook onto and then pull themselves towards walls at a fast speed. Hitting enemies with the hook will deal minor damage and stun them for a short duration. Allows players to steal items from the shop. The hook has an unlimited range.
Spawns a small table that can be flipped.
Causes water that bullets pass over to become electrified, damaging enemies. Decreases shot spread by 50%.
Increases rate of fire by 25%.
Taking damage makes the player briefly deal double damage and instantly reloads their weapon.
Falling into pits no longer deals damage.
Chests will not turn into Mimics.
Prevents the player from being affected by enemy knockback, gun recoil, and conveyor belts.
Allows the player to roll again mid-roll.
Damages the player for half a heart and increases their coolness by 1 per use. Coolness decreases the cooldown of active items and increases luck.
Reveals the entire map for the current floor.
Points in the direction of the floor's exit.
Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Negates poison damage.
Upon taking damage, triggers a blank effect and refills 50% of the ammo of all the player's guns. Increases curse by 1.
Teleport out of the current room into the shop of the current floor.
Decreases the radius that explosions will hurt the player in. Grants immunity to contact damage.
Increases the knockback of blanks. Grants an extra blank per floor.
Flipping a table briefly slows down time and triple the player's shots.
Flipping a table flips all other tables in the room, and flipping a table has a chance to spawn money.
Tables release a homing shotgun blast of bullets when flipped.
Flipping a table creates a large area in which all enemies will be set on fire.
Flipping a table briefly doubles the player's damage.
Thrown guns will explode.
Thrown guns will explode. Grants immunity to contact damage. Moving constantly without rolling or taking damage for 4 seconds charges a dodge roll, which will deal 300 damage.
Grants immunity to poison.
Increases the damage of companions and charmed enemies.
Follows the player around, occasionally digs up a pickup upon completing a room, and barks at mimic chests.
Increases damage by 25% and doubles knockback, but halves bullet speed.
Grants a heart container.
Grants a heart container.
Grants a heart container.
Grants a heart container.
Grants a heart container.
Ingredient for the Bullet That Can Kill The Past.
Ingredient for the Bullet That Can Kill The Past, cannot be used.
Ingredient for the Bullet That Can Kill The Past.
Ingredient for the Bullet That Can Kill The Past.
Single use. Resurrects your co-op partner with full health.
Grants an extra active item slot and increases maximum ammo by 10%.
Provides immunity to contact damage, and dodge rolls deal increased damage to enemies.
Grants two pieces of armor.
Grants two pieces of armor.
Grants a piece of armor. Consumed upon taking any damage.
Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Destroyed upon taking damage.
Upon use, the television is thrown in the direction of the cursor. Dropped upon dodge rolling.
Sprays water forward.
Has no effect on its own. Often spawned by destroying chests.
Grants 500  on pickup.
No effect.
Useless on its own. Has six variants, each of which reveals one of the directions necessary to make it through the maze in the Resourceful Rat's Lair.
